content: Instead of overloading, you can use a dynamic number of arguments. After the last parameter, you can pass optional unlimited parameters of the same type. These parameters are defined by adding a last parameter and adding ... after its type. The dynamic arguments will be received as an array:
stemmed: instead overload , use dynam number argument . after last paramet , pass option unlimit paramet type . these paramet defin ad last paramet ad ... type . the dynam argument receiv array :
